name: Arm Wrestling: I Love The Pump
name_original: Arm Wrestling: I Love The Pump
description:
Hit the gym and pump iron with your buddies. Get swole and dominate the gym in Smash Bros. style brawls. 

Local multiplayer nonsense for up to 8 players. Fully featured character customisation. Featuring the voice talent of Arnold Schwarzenegger with zero approval. Copyrighted music abounds, please don't sue us. 

Requires at least 2 controllers to play. 

Created in one week as a part of #CorporateJam. 

Credits:
Darcy Sandall
Cyrian Guillaume
Winston Tang
